description:
Bringing Baby Home 

Over an hour of hints, tips and demonstrations from medical and childcare experts for children ages 0-6 months. Woman narrators and medical advice from a male pediatrician.

Chapters include:

  • The Basics
  1. Baby’s appearance and head
  • Feeding
  1. Good breastfeeding promotion and instruction
  2. Recognizing your baby’s hunger signals
  3. Getting started breastfeeding, the importance of the latch. Bottle feeding is mentioned.
  • Hygiene & Sleep
  1. Swaddling
  2. Tummy time
  3. SIDS Car Seat Safety
  4. Safety tips for bathing newborns
  • Coping
  1. Making time for your relationship
  2. Advice for dads
  3. When to call the doctor
  4. Frequently asked questions
  5. Postpartum care and advice for couples
title: Bringing Baby Home
